main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Crescent City, Florida, on 31 July 1957.
interesting points: The object appeared round with a bright light in the center., The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes., The object was traveling in an east to west direction at a very rapid speed., The report includes a hand-drawn sketch of the object., The object observed in 1956 was described as round and larger than normal aircraft.
sighted object: round object with a bright light
